catalog_info.title: Visualization
catalog_info.notes: This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the General Education requirement for Empirical and Mathematical Reasoning.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Students are expected to have basic programming experience (e.g., Computer Science 50).
catalog_info.description: An introduction to key design principles and techniques for visualizing data. Covers design practices, data and image models, visual perception, interaction principles, visualization tools, and applications. Introduces programming of web-based interactive visualizations.
